  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_83248</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83248</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Un spectre</string>
            <string language="en">A spectrum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Spektrum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um spectrum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uno spettro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα φάσμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un espectro</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme montre un arc-en-ciel (au-dessus) et un  spectre obtenu à partir du fractionnement de lumière blanche en  utilisant un prisme de verre triangulaire (en bas).</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows a rainbow (top) and a spectrum obtained from white light split using a triangular glass prism (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">couleurs</string>
            <string language="en">colours</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">arc-en-ciel</string>
            <string language="en">rainbow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">spectre</string>
            <string language="en">spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">se dédoublant</string>
            <string language="en">splitting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">prisme de verre triangulaire</string>
            <string language="en">triangular glass prism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière blanche</string>
            <string language="en">white light</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt einen Regenbogen 
(Oberseite) und ein Spektrum, das von der weißen Lichtspalte mit 
einem dreieckigen Glasprisma (Unterseite) erhalten wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra um arco-íris (alto) e um 
spectrum obtido do split branco da luz usando um prisma de vidro 
triangular (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra un Rainbow (parte superiore)
e uno spettro ottenuto dalla spaccatura bianca della luce usando un 
prisma di vetro triangolare (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει ένα ουράνιο τόξο 
(κορυφή) και ένα φάσμα που λαμβάνεται από την άσπρη ελαφριά 
διάσπαση χρησιμοποιώντας ένα τριγωνικό πρίσμα γυαλιού (κατώτατο
σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra un arco iris (tapa) y un 
espectro obtenido de la fractura blanca de la luz usando un prisma de 
cristal triangular (fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regenbogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spektrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbindungsaufspaltung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">dreieckiges Glasprisma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">weißes Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arco-íris</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rachar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">prisma de vidro triangular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">luz branca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">spaccare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">prisma di vetro triangolare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">luce bianca</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χρώματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ουράνιο τόξο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φάσμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διαχωρισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τριγωνικό πρίσμα γυαλιού</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">colores</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arco iris</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
